A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One word... EPIC! Starwars Episode 8 The last Jedi goes where no other star wars film has\, taking huge risks that pay off nicely. Cinematography was wonderful\, story excellent and emotional\, acting solid\, and action intense! The only downfall came in one particular sequence for me which I felt to be a bit off putting. But for the most part it is just a blemish in a shining diamond. The Last Jedi is the best of this new trilogy and possibly of all time. 4.5/5
